channel.title: [DELTA] Adding a random item machine? [DELTA]
channel.description:
Can someone give me the code for adding a random item to the inventory?
Thanks, Molly :D

item.title: [DELTA] Adding a random item machine? [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

Try this:

add this in Item.java

[code] public static int Barrows[] = {592,592,592,};

    public static int randomBarrows()
    {
        return Barrows[(int)(Math.random()*Barrows.length)];
    }[/code]

(this is a example of me barrows items, replace the 592 with your random items and Change the name (Barrows)

Then

Add this somewhere

addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 1);

(Donâ€™t forgot to change Barrows to the Name you changed it to)

Where depends, you want to give it when you do a command? of when you click on an object??

Read full topic
